name: locize-backup-docker
description: Docker image for locize backup solution - Automated backup of locize translation files to S3 using locize-cli

scripts.build: DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 docker build --build-arg BUILD_DATE=$(date -u +'%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ') --build-arg VCS_REF=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD 2>/dev/null || echo 'unknown') --build-arg VERSION=$(cat .locize-cli-version) --build-arg LOCIZE_CLI_VERSION=$(cat .locize-cli-version) --label org.opencontainers.image.created=$(date -u +'%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ') --label org.opencontainers.image.version=$(cat .locize-cli-version) --label org.opencontainers.image.source=https://github.com/ligouras/locize --label org.opencontainers.image.title='Locize Backup' --label 'org.opencontainers.image.description=Backup solution for Locize i18n files using locize-cli' -t ligouras/locize-backup:latest -t ligouras/locize-backup:$(cat .locize-cli-version) .
scripts.build:multi: DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64,linux/arm64 --build-arg BUILD_DATE=$(date -u +'%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ') --build-arg VCS_REF=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD 2>/dev/null || echo 'unknown') --build-arg VERSION=$(cat .locize-cli-version) --build-arg LOCIZE_CLI_VERSION=$(cat .locize-cli-version) --label org.opencontainers.image.created=$(date -u +'%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ') --label org.opencontainers.image.version=$(cat .locize-cli-version) --label org.opencontainers.image.source=https://github.com/ligouras/locize --label org.opencontainers.image.title='Locize Backup' --label 'org.opencontainers.image.description=Backup solution for Locize i18n files using locize-cli' -t ligouras/locize-backup:latest -t ligouras/locize-backup:$(cat .locize-cli-version) .
scripts.build:push: npm run build && docker push ligouras/locize-backup:latest && docker push ligouras/locize-backup:$(cat .locize-cli-version)
scripts.build:force: DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 docker build --no-cache --build-arg BUILD_DATE=$(date -u +'%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ') --build-arg VCS_REF=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD 2>/dev/null || echo 'unknown') --build-arg VERSION=$(cat .locize-cli-version) --build-arg LOCIZE_CLI_VERSION=$(cat .locize-cli-version) --label org.opencontainers.image.created=$(date -u +'%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ') --label org.opencontainers.image.version=$(cat .locize-cli-version) --label org.opencontainers.image.source=https://github.com/ligouras/locize --label org.opencontainers.image.title='Locize Backup' --label 'org.opencontainers.image.description=Backup solution for Locize i18n files using locize-cli' -t ligouras/locize-backup:latest -t ligouras/locize-backup:$(cat .locize-cli-version) .
scripts.lint: docker run --rm -i hadolint/hadolint < Dockerfile || echo 'Hadolint not available' && find . -name '*.sh' -exec shellcheck {} + || echo 'Shellcheck not available'
scripts.clean: docker rmi ligouras/locize-backup || true && docker system prune -f
scripts.minio:start: docker compose --env-file .env.minio --profile testing up -d minio minio-setup
